name: seo-geo
description: SEO & GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) for websites. Optimize for AI search engines (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, Copilot, Claude) and traditional search (Google, Bing). Includes Princeton GEO research methods, hedge density analysis, AgentFacts/NANDA protocol, and platform-specific optimization strategies.

~~SEO.description: SEO tool API connection (Ahrefs, Semrush, DataForSEO, etc.)
